Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html#/c:@.name: radioPlayer(_:playbackStateDidChange:)
Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Called when the player changes the playing state

Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html#/c:@.name: radioPlayer(_:itemDidChange:)
Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Called when player changes the current player item

Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html#/c:@.name: radioPlayer(_:metadataDidChange:trackName:)
Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Called when player item changes the timed metadata value, it uses (separatedBy: -) to get the artist/song name, if you want more control over the raw metadata, consider using metadataDidChange rawValue instead

Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html#/c:@.name: radioPlayer(_:metadataDidChange:)
Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Called when player item changes the timed metadata value

Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html#/c:@.name: radioPlayer(_:artworkDidChange:)
Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html#/c:@.abstract: Called when the player gets the artwork for the playing song

Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html.name: FRadioPlayerDelegate
Protocols/FRadioPlayerDelegate.html.abstract: The FRadioPlayerDelegate protocol defines methods you can implement to respond to playback events associated with an FRadioPlayer object.

Enums/FRadioPlaybackState.html.name: FRadioPlaybackState
Enums/FRadioPlaybackState.html.abstract: FRadioPlayingState is the Player playing state enum

Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.name: isAutoPlay
Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.abstract: The player starts playing when the radioURL property gets set. (default == true)

Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.name: enableArtwork
Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.abstract: Enable fetching albums artwork from the iTunes API. (default == true)

Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.name: rate
Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.abstract: Read only property to get the current AVPlayer rate.

Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.name: play()
Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.abstract: Trigger the play function of the radio player

Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.name: pause()
Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.abstract: Trigger the pause function of the radio player

Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.name: stop()
Classes/FRadioPlayer.html#/s:12FRadioPla.abstract: Trigger the stop function of the radio player

Classes/FRadioPlayer.html.name: FRadioPlayer
Classes/FRadioPlayer.html.abstract: FRadioPlayer is a wrapper around AVPlayer to handle internet radio playback.
